pull.title: Show error message instead of exception crash when unable to bind RPC port

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
Show error message instead of exception crash when unable to bind RPC port

Fixes issue #875

events.body: I've updated the code to take @luke-jr's suggestions into account

comments.body: Why socket_base instead of boost::asio::ip::tcp::acceptor (as in current code)?
Any reason not to bind _after_ setting reuse_address (like boost itself does)?
yes that would be more logical order
boost itself uses socket_base::reuse_address internally, but that's fine with me too
